column5: Quaint cottage surrounded by trees. House has a big living space that opens to the back yard and another living space with a fireplace. Planting an herb garden to use while cooking in the modern kitchen. You'll enjoy walks in the neighborhood with sidewalks, wonderful old houses and trees. You will be conveniently located to all In the city. A precious rescue pup lives on the premises!
column8: Cozy cottage in middle of town.
